---
title: "Seurat tests"
output: rmarkdown::html_vignette
---


```r
library(Unravel)
library(Seurat)

pbmc_small <- SeuratObject::pbmc_small

pbmc_small = UpdateSeuratObject(object = pbmc_small)

all.genes <- rownames(pbmc_small)
pbmc_small %>%
  ScaleData(features = all.genes, do.center = FALSE) %>%
  Unravel::unravel()
```
